name: SUPER BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA INFLICTERZ
description:
Made for Kiwijam 2021!

SUPER BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA INFLICTERZ is a lovely videogame about small mutant creatures smacking each other over the head with rocks in a volcano.

FEATURES:

  • INFINITE MULTIPLAYER!! Theoretically at least. This game can take as many controllers as your computer can handle, but we've only tested about... six?
  • MUTATION MECHANICS!! You can swap the amount of arms and legs you have on the fly. More legs means you'll run faster, and more arms means you'll throw further and hit harder.
  • A BUNCH OF CUTE LITTLE FELLAS!! Bears, Rabbits, Octopi, Crickets, to name a few, all with different stats. There might even be a whole secret roster..........
